Package: com.jcatalog.grailsflow.scheduling.triggers

[Groovy] Class ConfigurableSimpleTrigger

        • com.jcatalog.grailsflow.scheduling.triggers.ConfigurableSimpleTrigger

        • ConfigurableSimpleTrigger is quartz SimpleTrigger that gets it's initial configuration from Grails application configuration grailsflow.scheduler..= where trigger properties are properties of org.quartz.SimpleTrigger

          Authors:
          Maria Voitovich
